welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zagarolo, a charming city nestled in the beautiful Italian countryside. Famous for its delicious cuisine, rich history, and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Zagarolo.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ciampino Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
